Item ID5321

Watermelon seeds are used to grow watermelons through the Farming skill at level 47. Players must plant 3 watermelon seeds per allotment. They may be obtained by pickpocketing Master Farmers, the Temple Trekking minigame, from the Wintertodt supply crate, and a possible reward from the high level gamble reward from the Barbarian Assault minigame. It can also be obtained from killing various monsters, and from seed packs which are awarded for completing contracts in the Farming Guild.

A nearby gardener will watch over your growing watermelons (excluding Harmony Island) at the cost of 10 curry leaves - either noted or unnoted. Having a fully grown nasturtium or white lily planted in a nearby flower patch protects watermelons from disease and thus allow players to avoid having to pay the gardener.

Watermelons are necessary to grow on Harmony Island for the Morytania Diary. There are no gardeners on the island to watch over your crops.

[[File:Watermelon seed detail.png|left|160px]]
'''Watermelon seeds''' are used to grow [[watermelon]]s through the [[Farming]] [[skill]] at level 47. Players must plant 3 watermelon seeds per [[allotment]]. They may be obtained by [[pickpocketing]] [[Master Farmer]]s, the [[Temple Trekking]] [[minigame]], from the [[Wintertodt]] [[supply crate]], and a possible reward from the high level gamble reward from the [[Barbarian Assault]] minigame. It can also be obtained from killing various monsters, and from [[seed pack]]s which are awarded for completing contracts in the [[Farming Guild]].

A nearby gardener '''will''' watch over your growing watermelons (excluding [[Harmony Island]]) at the cost of 10 [[Curry leaf|curry leaves]] - either noted or unnoted. Having a fully grown [[nasturtiums|nasturtium]] or [[white lily]] planted in a nearby [[Farming/Patch locations#Allotment/Flower/Herb patches|flower patch]] protects watermelons from [[Disease (Farming)|disease]] and thus allow players to avoid having to pay the gardener.

Watermelons are necessary to grow on [[Harmony Island]] for the [[Morytania Diary#Hard|Morytania Diary]]. There are no gardeners on the island to watch over your crops.
